Title: Twitter Marquee - Search for Tweets and show them as a marquee
Description: Twitter Marquee is a little WPF program that searches Twitter for a keyword or hashtag and shows the result as a marquee control.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Twitter Marquee is a little WPF program that searches Twitter for a keyword or hashtag and shows the result as a marquee control.

The project is implemented by using event based components (EBCs). See the doc folder for architecture diagrams.

Syntax
Start the program by providing the hashtag on the command line: twitterband.exe #ccd
